content:
I think the Bengals will face the Chiefs in the AFC Championship game. I've been impressed with their recent performances, and I think they've got the momentum going into the game. Plus, Joe Burrow seems like a clutch player who can make big plays when it matters most.

By the way, speaking of college football, did you catch any of the other games over the Thanksgiving break? I remember watching a few games with my cousins, including the Michigan-Ohio State rivalry game. What a game that was!
